resources.string: Recommended if you have basic english notions or have studied english less than two years.
Recommended if you have studied english in A-Levels, studied it more than two years or have lived in an english spoken country.
Recommended if you have a basic level of french. Corresponds with A1-A2 levels.
Recommended if you have a superior level of french. Corresponds with B1-B2.1 levels.
This test if for people that want a B2 or C1 level.
